attributes.description: The ISM current state. Coded by openEHR terminology group Instruction states.
attributes.name: current_state

attributes.description: The ISM transition which occurred to arrive in the current_state. Coded by openEHR terminology group  Instruction transitions.
attributes.name: transition

attributes.description: The step in the careflow process which occurred as part of generating this action, e.g.  dispense ,  start_administration. This attribute represents the clinical  label for the activity, as  opposed to current_state which represents  the state machine (ISM)  computable form. Defined in archetype.
attributes.name: careflow_step

attributes.description: Optional possibility of adding one or more reasons for this careflow step having been taken. Multiple reasons may occur in medication management for example.
attributes.name: reason

meta_info.description: Model of a transition in the Instruction State Machine, caused by a careflow step. The attributes document the careflow step as well as the ISM transition.
meta_info.name: ISM_TRANSITION
